{% verbatim %}

Struct GrpcBackgroundThreadPoolSizeOption (2.9.0)

The size of the background thread pool.

These threads are created by the client library to run a CompletionQueue which performs background work for gRPC.

Note: GrpcBackgroundThreadPoolSizeOption, GrpcCompletionQueueOption, and GrpcBackgroundThreadsFactoryOption are mutually exclusive. This option will be ignored if either GrpcCompletionQueueOption or GrpcBackgroundThreadsFactoryOption are set.

Type

Alias Of: std::size_t
{% endverbatim %}
